skins.shipDescription: Benson-class destroyer - Laffey, Hull Number DD-459!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the much anticipated Benson-class destroyer, Laffey, who performed excellently during the Third Battle of the Solomon Sea. Battleship? What's that?
skins.acquisition: Benson-class destroyer, Laffey, awaiting your orders... Commander, these ears aren't real... you don't need to stare at them...
skins.login: Did you have a good rest, Commander? I'm full of energy. Probably.
skins.details: Will you still come see me even if I grow out of this body?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, don't you think we should plant some flowers?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Since you're ignoring me, I might as well... *yawns*... get some sleep.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Yes? This is what I look like when I'm happy.
skins.secretaryIdle4: I'm not trying to make you pay attention to me. Nope, not at all...
skins.secretaryIdle5: I'm not trying to get you to play with me. Nope, probably not...

skins.shipDescription: Laffey, retrofit complete. I feel a rush of motivation and I will work harder in the future, probably... Hey, Commander, be serious now, stop touching my ears...
skins.acquisition: Laffey, retrofit complete. I feel a rush of motivation and I will work harder in the future, probably... Hey, Commander, be serious now, stop touching my ears...
skins.details: Javelin, Ayanami, Z23°≠ they are good friends. I miss them all dearly and I want to be with them.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I°Øm not making a pose to win praise from my Commander, emm, of course not.
skins.secretaryIdle2: But keeping this pose is... so tiresome... Commander, your lap, I want to take a nap on it Zzzzzz
skins.secretaryIdle3: Everyone has been saying that I look more handsome now, but my essence remains unchanged, is that a compliment?
skins.secretaryTouch: Emm... umm... uh-oh, I fell asleep while standing.

skins.shipDescription: Laffey seems to have changed a bit... Commander, do you like how Laffey is now?.
skins.acquisition: Laffey seems to have changed a bit... Commander, do you like how Laffey is now?
skins.login: Laffey has not been waiting for Commander to come back this entire time... Nnh, probably.
skins.details: Commander... you love me for who I am inside, not my body? Laffey doesn't understand the complicated stuff, but that means you'll always stay with me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Mm... Laffey is getting sleepy. Commander's lap feels nice, so I'll sleep here...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Laffey gets a disease that makes her fall asleep when she's not with Commander. I'm not lying, it's true...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even if Commander is staring at another girl, Laffey won't get upset at all. Mm, I really won't. Get. Upset. At. All.
skins.secretaryIdle4: Commander, if you pamper Laffey so much, she will turn into a Yayanami.
skins.secretaryIdle5: No matter how tough things get, Laffey will always return to Commander's side... Because we made a vow...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, did you also contract the disease that makes you fall asleep if you leave Laffey's side?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Laffey... has almost gotten used to Commander's lechery...
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Commander, do you like Laffey's bunny ears?

skins.shipDescription: Mmph... The waistline is too high... and a little too tight... The sleeves are too breezy cause they're so big... It's not like I wanted to change clothes, but... what do you think, Commander?
skins.acquisition: Mmph... The waistline is too high... and a little too tight... The sleeves are too breezy cause they're so big... It's not like I wanted to change clothes, but... what do you think, Commander?
skins.login: I look cute in it? Then I guess... I'll keep it on a little longer.
skins.details: Don't drag me around... I'm tired after my walk with the dog, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Want a candied apple, Commander? I got it from Ayanami. Here.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I hope... I'll have lots of good naps... this whole year.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, my friends are calling for me... so I'm gonna go play with them.

skins.shipDescription: "Have a happy New Year. Let's pray for everyone's good luck"... Is that enough...? *Yawn*, I'm tired... Can I go home now and take a nap...?
skins.acquisition: "Have a happy New Year. Let's pray for everyone's good luck"... Is that enough...? *Yawn*, I'm tired... Can I go home now and take a nap...?
skins.login: The Commander's still not back. I might just fall asleep here... Zzzzz...
skins.details: New Year... and Lunar New Year... are different? I don't really get it... Although, any day with good food and lots of sleep... is a good day. Mhm.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm wearing limited-edition Lunar New Year bunny ears and bunny slippers... do you like them? I like them.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I think Zed is interested in old Lunar New Year folklore...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Sitting on top of this tree makes me feel like I'm going to blossom, too...
skins.secretaryTouch: I totally don't feel like leaning against your shoulder, Commander. Nope, not at all...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, are you having weird thoughts again...?

skins.shipDescription: I'm done changing... how is it? Today, I°Øm supposed to call you "valued guest?" Um... I don°Øt really get it...
skins.acquisition: I'm done changing... how is it? Today, I°Øm supposed to call you "valued guest?" Um... I don°Øt really get it...
skins.login: Welcome, Comma®C valued guest. That was close. Almost messed it up....
skins.details: So like, I go like this? And then I say the line? Uh... "such biiig thankieees~, siiir~" was that it? Feels like Javelin's shtick.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I fell asleep and Z23 yelled at me... Z23 sucks...
skins.secretaryIdle2: This job is really hard... but spending time with everyone isn't so bad...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm working so hard, there's no way I can fail... but I am kinda sleepy. What should I do...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Smile? ...like this? I don't get it...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, are you a perverted customer?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, ahhn... Umm, Commander, Laffey does not need to be fed... Rather, Laffey should be the one feeding you...

"Laffey came from Planet Bunny..." Umm, I forgot that line Benson told me to say... In any case, everyone, please give me lots of support... Actually, just a little support is fine... Uhh, I have to do it again with more motivation?
skins.acquisition: "Laffey came from Planet Bunny..." Umm, I forgot that line Benson told me to say... In any case, everyone, please give me lots of support... Actually, just a little support is fine... Uhh, I have to do it again with more motivation?
skins.details: Benson was also there when Javelin asked me to become an idol... When I saw the glint in her eye, I knew things weren't going to end well...
skins.secretaryIdle1: All these lessons and rehearsals... What a pain... Can I just put on a show where I sleep while standing up?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Even though Benson said that Laffey would do the entire Planet Bunny proud by becoming an idol, it honestly sounds like a pain in the bun. However, the outfit she made for me is really cute... so maybe I can put in some effort for her sake.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm done with today's lessons... they were unexpectedly fun.
skins.secretaryIdle4: ...I think I got some fanmail? Mm, it makes me a little happy..
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, Laffey seems to be getting better at singing, because I can stand still now...
